channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

Report E-2024010106

item.description:
Report X-2023120638

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-07
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: A Fully regulated package came to QA wet and soiled after inspection loose caps on bottles caused the spill soiling the box and other contents in the box DescribePack: loose caps and punctured bottles caused the spill DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was brought to QA for inspection in a lined tote

item.title: Report X-2023120652
item.description:
Report X-2023120652

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-09T06:14:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-07
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package discovered leaking on load side after it was scanned to a trailer. Upon inspection a loose cap was determined to be the cause of the leak. Package was placed into a damaged hazmat tote complete with liner however, orientation arrows were not initially observed which caused additional leakage. DescribePack: Loose cap no seal on contents. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed into damage tote with liner. Initially orientation arrows were not observed, once noticed position of package righted.

item.title: Report X-2023120681
item.description:
Report X-2023120681

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-08T00:36:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-10
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to unload trailer 554502 due to a leaking hazmat and when QA arrived pkg. was leaking out and QA placed inside a lined tote and took to hazmat cage to get inspected. DescribePack: Inner cans were punctured and dented on bottom due to there were no slotted partitions from keeping the inner cans pressing up against each other and causing cans to get punctured and dented. And liquid was leaking out of the bottom of the cans where the dents were. DurationRel: 13 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023120663
item.description:
Report X-2023120663

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-08T00:36:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in corrugated carton with corrugated divider. Pinhole in handle of one jug allowed leakage which soiled other jugs and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2023120718
item.description:
Report X-2023120718

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-08T00:36:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-12
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. came to QA wet on the IC belt and QA pulled off and placed inside a lined tote. DescribePack: Closures came loose and liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner cans. DurationRel: 13 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was placed inside a lined tote and QA took to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2023120833
item.description:
Report X-2023120833

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damage was discovered in the unload. Upon discovery, the unload manager called for an Admin to come down and contain the shipment. DescribePack: 2 of the 4 bottles have loose lids DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the damaged hazmat in a hazardous material spill tote and promptly transported the damage to the hazardous materials cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2023120831
item.description:
Report X-2023120831

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: BROOMFIELD
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This hazmat was discovered leaking at 10:20pm in front of trailer 130 on the load side by a manager during outbound. The manager called QA whom p/u hazmat and placed it in a red tote. The hazmat was then taken to fumigator. DescribePack: The cap on the pail is not properly sealed. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The hazmat was placed in a plastic bag and red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120632
item.description:
Report X-2023120632

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-04T15:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at station wet due to internal leakage from loose caps in 2 bottles of Nu-Calgon Alka-Brite Plus Condenser Coil Cleaner. Package was found by QA at the end of the AM sort near the sorter. Package was already in a plastic bag when it was found, QA placed package in another bag & hazmat tote following a code 39 & being brought to damages to process. DescribePack: Due to the leak, outer & inner container is wet & punctured. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic bag then bagged again & placed in a hazmat tote to avoid further damage & contain spill.

item.title: Report X-2023120836

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called out for an admin's assistance in containing the shipment. DescribePack: The shipment leaked from the loose lid/closure. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The admin contained the shipment in a damaged hazardous material spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.
